text.title:
Ossian's interactive friendly network. 
Nodes colored by gender
text.more:
The character network for the epic poems of Ossian.
Male characters are represented by blue nodes and females are in red.
Nodes with unspecified gender are in grey.
The edges (links) represent interactions or relationships between pairs of 
characters.
